options.content:
- Use Cases: This dashboard can be used to track bugs.
- Data Source Required: GitHub ([transformation](https://devlake.apache.org/docs/UserManuals/ConfigUI/GitHub#step-3---adding-transformation-rules-optional) required. Additional settings are required to get version data).

targets.rawSql:
-- Get the bug distribution in major versions
with bugs_in_each_tag as(
	select 
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_id,'refs/tags/', -1) as tag_name, 
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_id,':', 4) as repo_id,
		i.issue_key, i.type, i.title, i.description
	from
		refs_issues_diffs rid
		left join issues i on rid.issue_id = i.id
	where
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_id,':', 4) in (${repo_id})
		and i.type = 'BUG'
)


SELECT 
	concat(SUBSTRING_INDEX(biet.tag_name,'.',3), '.x') as minor_version,
	count(*) as bug_count
FROM 
	bugs_in_each_tag biet
GROUP BY 1

-- Get the number of fixed bugs in the last 5 tags
with refs_commits_diffs as(
  SELECT
    new_refs.id as new_ref_id, old_refs.id as old_ref_id, commits_diffs.commit_sha, new_commit_sha, old_commit_sha
  FROM
    commits_diffs
  LEFT JOIN refs new_refs on new_refs.commit_sha = commits_diffs.new_commit_sha
  LEFT JOIN refs old_refs on old_refs.commit_sha = commits_diffs.old_commit_sha
),

_last_5_tags as(
  SELECT 
    distinct SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_id,':', -1) as new_ref_id, SUBSTRING_INDEX(old_ref_id,':', -1) as old_ref_id
    -- distinct new_ref_id, old_ref_id
  FROM 
    refs_commits_diffs
  WHERE
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_id,':', 4) in (${repo_id})
	ORDER BY 1 desc
	LIMIT 5
),

_bugs_of_tags as(
	select 
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_id,'tags/', -1) as tag_name, 
		-- SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_id,':', 3) as repo_id,
		count(*) as bug_count
	from
		refs_issues_diffs rid
		left join issues i on rid.issue_id = i.id
	where
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_id,':', 4) in (${repo_id})
		-- and rid.new_ref_id in (SELECT new_ref_id FROM _last_5_tags)
		and SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_id,':', -1) in (SELECT new_ref_id FROM _last_5_tags)
		and i.type = 'BUG'
	-- GROUP BY 1,2
	  GROUP BY 1
),

_combine_pr as (
  select pull_request_id as id, commit_sha from pull_request_commits left join pull_requests p on pull_request_commits.pull_request_id = p.id
  where p.base_repo_id in (${repo_id})
  union
  select id, merge_commit_sha as commit_sha from pull_requests where base_repo_id in (${repo_id})
),

_commit_count_of_pr as(
  select
    SUBSTRING_INDEX(rcd.new_ref_id,'tags/', -1) as tag_name, 
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rcd.new_ref_id,':', 4) as repo_id,
    pr.id as pull_request_id,
    count(c.sha) as commit_count
  FROM 
    refs_commits_diffs rcd
		left join commits c on rcd.commit_sha = c.sha
		-- left join pull_request_commits prc on c.sha = prc.commit_sha
		left join _combine_pr pr on c.sha = pr.commit_sha
	where
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rcd.new_ref_id,':', 4) in (${repo_id})
		-- and rcd.new_ref_id in (SELECT new_ref_id FROM _last_5_tags)
		and SUBSTRING_INDEX(rcd.new_ref_id,':', -1) in (SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_id,':', -1) FROM _last_5_tags)
	group by 1,2,3
),

_pr_worktype as(
  select
    distinct pri.pull_request_id,i.type
  from
    pull_request_issues pri
    left join pull_requests pr on pri.pull_request_id = pr.id
    left join issues i on pri.issue_id = i.id
  where 
    i.issue_key != 0
),

_pr_elco_and_worktype as(
  select
    ccop.tag_name, 
    sum(case when pw.type = 'BUG' then commit_count else 0 end)/sum(commit_count) as cost_percentage
  from 
    _commit_count_of_pr ccop
    left join _pr_worktype pw on ccop.pull_request_id = pw.pull_request_id
  GROUP BY 1
)

SELECT 
	bot.tag_name,
	bot.bug_count,
	peaw.cost_percentage as "cost_percentage(bugfixing commits/total commits)"
FROM 
	_bugs_of_tags bot
	join _pr_elco_and_worktype peaw on bot.tag_name = peaw.tag_name
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: 2.1 Ratio of Bug Fix Commits [Last 5 Tags]

targets.rawSql:
-- Get the  severity distribution in bugs
-- Get the work-type distribution in the last n tags
with refs_commits_diffs as(
  SELECT
    new_refs.id as new_ref_id, old_refs.id as old_ref_id, commits_diffs.commit_sha, new_commit_sha, old_commit_sha
  FROM
    commits_diffs
  LEFT JOIN refs new_refs on new_refs.commit_sha = commits_diffs.new_commit_sha
  LEFT JOIN refs old_refs on old_refs.commit_sha = commits_diffs.old_commit_sha
),

_last_n_tags as(
  SELECT 
    -- distinct new_ref_id, old_ref_id
    distinct SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_id,':', -1) as new_ref_id, SUBSTRING_INDEX(old_ref_id,':', -1) as old_ref_id
  FROM 
    refs_commits_diffs
  WHERE
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_id,':', 4) in (${repo_id})
	ORDER BY 1 desc
	LIMIT 1
),

bugs_in_each_tag as(
	select 
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_id,'refs/tags/', -1) as tag_name, 
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_id,':', 4) as repo_id,
		i.issue_key, i.type, i.title, i.description, i.severity 
	from
		refs_issues_diffs rid
		left join issues i on rid.issue_id = i.id
	where
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_id,':', 4) in (${repo_id})
		-- and rid.new_ref_id in (SELECT new_ref_id FROM _last_n_tags)
		and SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_id,':', -1) in (SELECT new_ref_id FROM _last_n_tags)
		and i.type = 'BUG'
)

SELECT 
   concat(biet.tag_name, " ", case when biet.severity != '' then biet.severity else 'UNKNOWN' end) as severity,
   count(*) as bug_count
FROM 
	bugs_in_each_tag biet
GROUP BY 1

-- Get the  severity distribution in bugs
-- Get the work-type distribution in the last n tags
with refs_commits_diffs as(
  SELECT
    new_refs.id as new_ref_id, old_refs.id as old_ref_id, commits_diffs.commit_sha, new_commit_sha, old_commit_sha
  FROM
    commits_diffs
  LEFT JOIN refs new_refs on new_refs.commit_sha = commits_diffs.new_commit_sha
  LEFT JOIN refs old_refs on old_refs.commit_sha = commits_diffs.old_commit_sha
),

_last_n_tags as(
  SELECT 
    -- distinct new_ref_id, old_ref_id
    distinct SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_id,':', -1) as new_ref_id, SUBSTRING_INDEX(old_ref_id,':', -1) as old_ref_id
  FROM 
    refs_commits_diffs
  WHERE
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_id,':', 4) in (${repo_id})
	ORDER BY 1 desc
	LIMIT 1,1
),

bugs_in_each_tag as(
	select 
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_id,'refs/tags/', -1) as tag_name, 
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_id,':', 4) as repo_id,
		i.issue_key, i.type, i.title, i.description, i.severity 
	from
		refs_issues_diffs rid
		left join issues i on rid.issue_id = i.id
	where
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_id,':', 4) in (${repo_id})
		-- and rid.new_ref_id in (SELECT new_ref_id FROM _last_n_tags)
		and SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_id,':', -1) in (SELECT new_ref_id FROM _last_n_tags)
		and i.type = 'BUG'
)

SELECT 
   concat(biet.tag_name, " ", case when biet.severity != '' then biet.severity else 'UNKNOWN' end) as severity,
   count(*) as bug_count
FROM 
	bugs_in_each_tag biet
GROUP BY 1

-- Get the  severity distribution in bugs
-- Get the work-type distribution in the last n tags
with refs_commits_diffs as(
  SELECT
    new_refs.id as new_ref_id, old_refs.id as old_ref_id, commits_diffs.commit_sha, new_commit_sha, old_commit_sha
  FROM
    commits_diffs
  LEFT JOIN refs new_refs on new_refs.commit_sha = commits_diffs.new_commit_sha
  LEFT JOIN refs old_refs on old_refs.commit_sha = commits_diffs.old_commit_sha
),

_last_n_tags as(
  SELECT 
    -- distinct new_ref_id, old_ref_id
    distinct SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_id,':', -1) as new_ref_id, SUBSTRING_INDEX(old_ref_id,':', -1) as old_ref_id
  FROM 
    refs_commits_diffs
  WHERE
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_id,':', 4) in (${repo_id})
	ORDER BY 1 desc
	LIMIT 2,1
),

bugs_in_each_tag as(
	select 
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_id,'refs/tags/', -1) as tag_name, 
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_id,':', 4) as repo_id,
		i.issue_key, i.type, i.title, i.description, i.severity 
	from
		refs_issues_diffs rid
		left join issues i on rid.issue_id = i.id
	where
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_id,':', 4) in (${repo_id})
		-- and rid.new_ref_id in (SELECT new_ref_id FROM _last_n_tags)
		and SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_id,':', -1) in (SELECT new_ref_id FROM _last_n_tags)
		and i.type = 'BUG'
)

SELECT 
   concat(biet.tag_name, " ", case when biet.severity != '' then biet.severity else 'UNKNOWN' end) as severity,
   count(*) as bug_count
FROM 
	bugs_in_each_tag biet
GROUP BY 1

-- Get the number of fixed bugs in the last 5 tags
with refs_commits_diffs as(
  SELECT
    new_refs.id as new_ref_id, old_refs.id as old_ref_id, commits_diffs.commit_sha, new_commit_sha, old_commit_sha
  FROM
    commits_diffs
  LEFT JOIN refs new_refs on new_refs.commit_sha = commits_diffs.new_commit_sha
  LEFT JOIN refs old_refs on old_refs.commit_sha = commits_diffs.old_commit_sha
),

_last_5_tags as(
  SELECT 
    -- distinct new_ref_id, old_ref_id
    distinct SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_id,':', -1) as new_ref_id, SUBSTRING_INDEX(old_ref_id,':', -1) as old_ref_id
  FROM 
    refs_commits_diffs
  WHERE
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_id,':', 4) in (${repo_id})
	ORDER BY 1 desc
	LIMIT 5
)
	
select distinct
	b.name as repo_name,
	SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_id,'tags/', -1) as tag_name, 
	i.issue_key as issue_key,
	i.title,
	i.assignee_name,
	i.lead_time_minutes/1440 as lead_time_in_days,
	concat(b.url,'/',i.issue_key) as url
from
	refs_issues_diffs rid
	left join issues i on rid.issue_id = i.id
	join boards b on SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_id,':', 4) = b.id
where
	SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_id,':', 4) in (${repo_id})
	-- and rid.new_ref_id in (SELECT new_ref_id FROM _last_5_tags)
	and SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_id,':', -1) in (SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_id,':', -1) FROM _last_5_tags)
	and i.type = 'BUG'
order by tag_name desc

-- Component distribution of bugs fixed in the last 5 tags
with refs_commits_diffs as(
  SELECT
    new_refs.id as new_ref_id, old_refs.id as old_ref_id, commits_diffs.commit_sha, new_commit_sha, old_commit_sha
  FROM
    commits_diffs
  LEFT JOIN refs new_refs on new_refs.commit_sha = commits_diffs.new_commit_sha
  LEFT JOIN refs old_refs on old_refs.commit_sha = commits_diffs.old_commit_sha
),

_last_5_tags as(
  SELECT 
    -- distinct new_ref_id, old_ref_id
    distinct SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_id,':', -1) as new_ref_id, SUBSTRING_INDEX(old_ref_id,':', -1) as old_ref_id
  FROM 
    refs_commits_diffs
  WHERE
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_id,':', 4) in (${repo_id})
	ORDER BY 1 desc
	LIMIT 5
),

bugs_in_each_tag as(
	select 
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_id,'refs/', -1) as tag_name, 
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_id,':', 4) as repo_id,
		i.issue_key, i.component, i.severity, i.title, i.description
	from
		refs_issues_diffs rid
		left join issues i on rid.issue_id = i.id
	where
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_id,':', 4) in (${repo_id})
		-- and rid.new_ref_id in (SELECT new_ref_id FROM _last_5_tags)
		and SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_id,':', -1) in (SELECT new_ref_id FROM _last_5_tags)
		and i.type = 'BUG'
)


SELECT
	case when component = '' then 'unlabeled' else 'labeled' end as component,
	count(*) as bug_count
FROM 
	bugs_in_each_tag biet
GROUP BY 1

panels.title: 3.1 Ratio of Issues with 'Component' Label [Last 5 Tags]

targets.rawSql:
-- Component distribution of bugs fixed in the last 5 tags
with refs_commits_diffs as(
  SELECT
    new_refs.id as new_ref_id, old_refs.id as old_ref_id, commits_diffs.commit_sha, new_commit_sha, old_commit_sha
  FROM
    commits_diffs
  LEFT JOIN refs new_refs on new_refs.commit_sha = commits_diffs.new_commit_sha
  LEFT JOIN refs old_refs on old_refs.commit_sha = commits_diffs.old_commit_sha
),

_last_5_tags as(
  SELECT 
    -- distinct new_ref_id, old_ref_id
    distinct SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_id,':', -1) as new_ref_id, SUBSTRING_INDEX(old_ref_id,':', -1) as old_ref_id
  FROM 
    refs_commits_diffs
  WHERE
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_id,':', 4) in (${repo_id})
	ORDER BY 1 desc
	LIMIT 5
),

bugs_in_each_tag as(
	select 
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_id,'refs/', -1) as tag_name, 
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_id,':', 4) as repo_id,
		i.issue_key, i.component, i.severity, i.title, i.description
	from
		refs_issues_diffs rid
		left join issues i on rid.issue_id = i.id
	where
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_id,':', 4) in (${repo_id})
		-- and rid.new_ref_id in (SELECT new_ref_id FROM _last_5_tags)
		and SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_id,':', -1) in (SELECT new_ref_id FROM _last_5_tags)
		and i.type = 'BUG'
)


SELECT
	component,
	count(*) as bug_count
FROM 
	bugs_in_each_tag biet
where 
  component != ''
GROUP BY 1

panels.title: 3.2 Source of Bugs by Component [Last 5 Tags]

targets.rawSql:
-- Get the % of contributors who fixed 80% of bugs in the last 5 tags
with refs_commits_diffs as(
  SELECT
    new_refs.id as new_ref_id, old_refs.id as old_ref_id, commits_diffs.commit_sha, new_commit_sha, old_commit_sha
  FROM
    commits_diffs
  LEFT JOIN refs new_refs on new_refs.commit_sha = commits_diffs.new_commit_sha
  LEFT JOIN refs old_refs on old_refs.commit_sha = commits_diffs.old_commit_sha
),

_last_5_tags as(
  SELECT 
    -- distinct new_ref_id, old_ref_id
    distinct SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_id,':', -1) as new_ref_id, SUBSTRING_INDEX(old_ref_id,':', -1) as old_ref_id
  FROM 
    refs_commits_diffs
  WHERE
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_id,':', 4) in (${repo_id})
	ORDER BY 1 desc
	LIMIT 5
),

_bugs as(
	select 
		i.issue_key, i.type, i.severity, i.title, i.description,
		pr.id, pr.author_name as pr_author, pr.created_date,
		rank() over(partition by i.id order by pr.created_date asc) as pr_rank
	from
		refs_issues_diffs rid
		left join issues i on rid.issue_id = i.id
		left join pull_request_issues pri on i.id = pri.issue_id
		left join pull_requests pr on pri.pull_request_id = pr.id
	where
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_id,':', 4) in (${repo_id})
		-- and rid.new_ref_id in (SELECT new_ref_id FROM _last_5_tags)
		and SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_id,':', -1) in (SELECT new_ref_id FROM _last_5_tags)
		and i.type = 'BUG'
	order by i.issue_key
),

_bug_fixed_count as(
  SELECT 
    pr_author,
    count(*) bug_fixed_count
  FROM _bugs
  WHERE pr_rank = 1
  GROUP BY 1
),

_bug_fixed_count_running_total as(
  SELECT 
    *, 
    sum(bug_fixed_count) OVER (Order by bug_fixed_count desc) AS running_total
  FROM 
    _bug_fixed_count
),

_percentile as(
  SELECT 
    pr_author,
    bug_fixed_count,
    running_total/sum(bug_fixed_count) OVER () AS cumulative_percentage
  FROM 
    _bug_fixed_count_running_total
)


SELECT 
  count(case when cumulative_percentage <= 0.8 then pr_author else null end)/count(*) as "% of contributors who fixed 80% of the bugs"
FROM _percentile

-- Get the bug fixer distribution in the last 5 tags
with refs_commits_diffs as(
  SELECT
    new_refs.id as new_ref_id, old_refs.id as old_ref_id, commits_diffs.commit_sha, new_commit_sha, old_commit_sha
  FROM
    commits_diffs
  LEFT JOIN refs new_refs on new_refs.commit_sha = commits_diffs.new_commit_sha
  LEFT JOIN refs old_refs on old_refs.commit_sha = commits_diffs.old_commit_sha
),

_last_5_tags as(
  SELECT 
    -- distinct new_ref_id, old_ref_id
    distinct SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_id,':', -1) as new_ref_id, SUBSTRING_INDEX(old_ref_id,':', -1) as old_ref_id
  FROM 
    refs_commits_diffs
  WHERE
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_id,':', 4) in (${repo_id})
	ORDER BY 1 desc
	LIMIT 5
),

_bugs as(
	select 
		i.issue_key, i.type, i.severity, i.title, i.description,
		pr.id, pr.author_name as pr_author, pr.created_date,
		rank() over(partition by i.id order by pr.created_date asc) as pr_rank
	from
		refs_issues_diffs rid
		left join issues i on rid.issue_id = i.id
		left join pull_request_issues pri on i.id = pri.issue_id
		left join pull_requests pr on pri.pull_request_id = pr.id
	where
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_id,':', 4) in (${repo_id})
		-- and rid.new_ref_id in (SELECT new_ref_id FROM _last_5_tags)
		and SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_id,':', -1) in (SELECT new_ref_id FROM _last_5_tags)
		and i.type = 'BUG'
	order by i.issue_key
)

SELECT 
  pr_author,
  count(*) bug_fixed_count
FROM _bugs
WHERE pr_rank = 1
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 2 desc
limit 10

-- Get the avg bug age in history
select 
  avg(lead_time_minutes)/1440 as average_bug_age
from issues
left join board_issues bi on issues.id = bi.issue_id
where 
  type = 'BUG'
  and status = 'DONE'
  and bi.board_id in (${repo_id})

panels.title: 5.1 Mean Bug Age in Days [All History]

targets.rawSql:
-- Get the bug age in the last 5 tags
with refs_commits_diffs as(
  SELECT
    new_refs.id as new_ref_id, old_refs.id as old_ref_id, commits_diffs.commit_sha, new_commit_sha, old_commit_sha
  FROM
    commits_diffs
  LEFT JOIN refs new_refs on new_refs.commit_sha = commits_diffs.new_commit_sha
  LEFT JOIN refs old_refs on old_refs.commit_sha = commits_diffs.old_commit_sha
),

_last_5_tags as(
  SELECT 
    distinct SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_id,':', -1) as new_ref_id, SUBSTRING_INDEX(old_ref_id,':', -1) as old_ref_id
  FROM 
    refs_commits_diffs
  WHERE
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_id,':', 4) in (${repo_id})
	ORDER BY 1 desc
	LIMIT 5
),

_bugs as(
	select distinct
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_id,'tags/', -1) as tag_name,
		i.id,
		i.lead_time_minutes
	from
		refs_issues_diffs rid
		left join issues i on rid.issue_id = i.id
		left join pull_request_issues pri on i.id = pri.issue_id
	where
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_id,':', 4) in (${repo_id})
		-- and rid.new_ref_id in (SELECT new_ref_id FROM _last_5_tags)
		and SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_id,':', -1) in (SELECT new_ref_id FROM _last_5_tags)
		and i.type = 'BUG'
),

_bugs_percentile as(
  select 
    *,
    percent_rank() over (partition by tag_name order by lead_time_minutes) as percentile
  from _bugs order by 1
),

_avg_bug_age as(
  select 
    tag_name,
    avg(lead_time_minutes)/1440 as average_bug_age
  from _bugs_percentile
  group by 1
),

_50th_bug_age as(
  select 
    tag_name,
    min(lead_time_minutes)/1440 as "50th_bug_age"
  from _bugs_percentile
    where percentile >= 0.5
  group by 1
)

select 
  aba.*,
  eba.50th_bug_age
from 
  _avg_bug_age aba
  join _50th_bug_age eba on aba.tag_name = eba.tag_name

panels.title: 5.2 Mean + Median Bug Age Days [Last 5 Tags]

targets.rawSql:
-- Get the 80th perccentile bug age in history
with _bugs_percentile as(
  select 
    id,
    lead_time_minutes,
    percent_rank() over (order by lead_time_minutes) as percentile
  from issues
  where 
    type = 'BUG'
    and status = 'DONE'
)

select 
  min(lead_time_minutes)/1440 as "80th_bug_age"
from 
  _bugs_percentile
where 
  percentile >= 0.5

panels.title: 5.3 Median Bug Age in Days [All History]

targets.rawSql:
-- Get the bug fixer distribution in the last 5 tags
with refs_commits_diffs as(
  SELECT
    new_refs.id as new_ref_id, old_refs.id as old_ref_id, commits_diffs.commit_sha, new_commit_sha, old_commit_sha
  FROM
    commits_diffs
  LEFT JOIN refs new_refs on new_refs.commit_sha = commits_diffs.new_commit_sha
  LEFT JOIN refs old_refs on old_refs.commit_sha = commits_diffs.old_commit_sha
),

_last_5_tags as(
  SELECT 
    -- distinct new_ref_id, old_ref_id
    distinct SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_id,':', -1) as new_ref_id, SUBSTRING_INDEX(old_ref_id,':', -1) as old_ref_id
  FROM 
    refs_commits_diffs
  WHERE
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_id,':', 4) in (${repo_id})
	ORDER BY 1 desc
	LIMIT 5
),

_bugs as(
	select distinct
	  b.name,
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_id,'tags/', -1) as tag_name,
		i.issue_key as issue_key,
    i.title,
    i.lead_time_minutes/1440 as lead_time_in_days,
    concat(b.url,'/',i.issue_key) as url
	from
		refs_issues_diffs rid
		left join issues i on rid.issue_id = i.id
		left join pull_request_issues pri on i.id = pri.issue_id
		join boards b on SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_id,':', 4) = b.id
	where
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_id,':', 4) in (${repo_id})
		-- and rid.new_ref_id in (SELECT new_ref_id FROM _last_5_tags)
		and SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_id,':', -1) in (SELECT new_ref_id FROM _last_5_tags)
		and i.type = 'BUG'
),

_bug_age_rank as(
  select 
    *,
    row_number() over (partition by tag_name order by lead_time_in_days desc) as bug_age_rank
  from _bugs
)

select 
  name,
  tag_name,
  issue_key,
  title,
  lead_time_in_days,
  url
from _bug_age_rank
where bug_age_rank <=10 
order by tag_name, lead_time_in_days desc

panels.title: 5.4 List of Long-Lead Bugs [Closed Bugs in Last 5  Tags]

targets.rawSql:
-- Get the avg bug age in history
with _avg_bug_age as(
  select 
    type,
    avg(lead_time_minutes) as average_bug_age
  from 
    issues
    left join board_issues bi on issues.id = bi.issue_id
  where 
    type = 'BUG'
    and status = 'DONE'
    and bi.board_id in (${repo_id})
  group by 1
),


_bug_queue_time as(
  select 
    i.id,
    abg.average_bug_age,
    TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE,created_date,NOW()) as queue_time,
    case when TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE,created_date,NOW()) >= average_bug_age then ">=avg_bug_age" else "<avg_bug_age" end as distribution
  from 
    issues i
    left join _avg_bug_age abg on i.type = abg.type
  where
    i.type = 'BUG'
    and status != 'DONE'
)

select
  distribution,
  count(*) as bug_count
from
  _bug_queue_time
group by 1

panels.title: 5.5 Ratio of Outstanding Bugs [Queue Time > Mean]

targets.rawSql:
-- Get the queue time of all backlog bugs
select 
  b.name as repo_name,
  i.issue_key as issue_key,
  i.title,
  i.created_date,
  (TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, i.created_date,NOW()))/3600 as queue_time_in_days,
  concat(b.url,'/',i.issue_key) as url
from 
  issues i
  left join board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
  left join boards b on bi.board_id = b.id
where
  i.type = 'BUG'
  and i.status != 'DONE'
  and b.id in (${repo_id})
order by queue_time_in_days desc

panels.title: 5.6 List of Outstanding Bugs [All Open Bugs]

targets.rawSql:
-- Get the bug distribution in last 5 tags
with refs_commits_diffs as(
  SELECT
    new_refs.id as new_ref_id, old_refs.id as old_ref_id, commits_diffs.commit_sha, new_commit_sha, old_commit_sha
  FROM
    commits_diffs
  LEFT JOIN refs new_refs on new_refs.commit_sha = commits_diffs.new_commit_sha
  LEFT JOIN refs old_refs on old_refs.commit_sha = commits_diffs.old_commit_sha
),

_last_5_tags as(
  SELECT 
    -- distinct new_ref_id, old_ref_id
    distinct SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_id,':', -1) as new_ref_id, SUBSTRING_INDEX(old_ref_id,':', -1) as old_ref_id
  FROM 
    refs_commits_diffs
  WHERE
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_id,':', 4) in (${repo_id})
	ORDER BY 1 desc
	LIMIT 10
)

select 
	SUBSTRING_INDEX(rcd.new_ref_id,'refs/tags/', -1) as tag_name,
	SUBSTRING_INDEX(rcd.old_ref_id,'refs/tags/', -1) as old_tag_name,
	count(*) as commit_count
from
	refs_commits_diffs rcd
	left join commits c on rcd.commit_sha = c.sha
where
	SUBSTRING_INDEX(rcd.new_ref_id,':', 4) in (${repo_id})
	-- and rcd.new_ref_id in (select new_ref_id from _last_5_tags)
	and SUBSTRING_INDEX(rcd.new_ref_id,':', -1) in (SELECT new_ref_id FROM _last_5_tags)
group by 1,2
order by 1

panels.title: 6.1 Number of New Commits Per Tag

targets.rawSql:
-- Get the bug distribution in last 5 tags
with refs_commits_diffs as(
  SELECT
    new_refs.id as new_ref_id, old_refs.id as old_ref_id, commits_diffs.commit_sha, new_commit_sha, old_commit_sha
  FROM
    commits_diffs
  LEFT JOIN refs new_refs on new_refs.commit_sha = commits_diffs.new_commit_sha
  LEFT JOIN refs old_refs on old_refs.commit_sha = commits_diffs.old_commit_sha
),

_last_5_tags as(
  SELECT 
    -- distinct new_ref_id, old_ref_id
    distinct SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_id,':', -1) as new_ref_id, SUBSTRING_INDEX(old_ref_id,':', -1) as old_ref_id
  FROM 
    refs_commits_diffs
  WHERE
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_id,':', 4) in (${repo_id})
	ORDER BY 1 desc
	LIMIT 10
)

select 
	SUBSTRING_INDEX(rcd.new_ref_id,'refs/tags/', -1) as new_tag_name,
	SUBSTRING_INDEX(rcd.old_ref_id,'refs/tags/', -1) as compared_tag_name,
	c.sha,
	c.message,
	c.additions,
	c.deletions,
	c.author_name
from
	refs_commits_diffs rcd
	left join commits c on rcd.commit_sha = c.sha
where
	SUBSTRING_INDEX(rcd.new_ref_id,':', 4) in (${repo_id})
	-- and rcd.new_ref_id in (select new_ref_id from _last_5_tags)
	and SUBSTRING_INDEX(rcd.new_ref_id,':', -1) in (SELECT new_ref_id FROM _last_5_tags)
order by 1 desc

-- Get the work-type distribution in the last 5 tags
with refs_commits_diffs as(
  SELECT
    new_refs.id as new_ref_id, old_refs.id as old_ref_id, commits_diffs.commit_sha, new_commit_sha, old_commit_sha
  FROM
    commits_diffs
  LEFT JOIN refs new_refs on new_refs.commit_sha = commits_diffs.new_commit_sha
  LEFT JOIN refs old_refs on old_refs.commit_sha = commits_diffs.old_commit_sha
),

_last_5_tags as(
  SELECT 
    -- distinct new_ref_id, old_ref_id
    distinct SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_id,':', -1) as new_ref_id, SUBSTRING_INDEX(old_ref_id,':', -1) as old_ref_id
  FROM 
    refs_commits_diffs
  WHERE
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_id,':', 4) in (${repo_id})
	ORDER BY 1 desc
	LIMIT 1
),

_combine_pr as (
  select pull_request_id as id, commit_sha, p.pull_request_key as pull_request_key from pull_request_commits left join pull_requests p on pull_request_commits.pull_request_id = p.id
  where base_repo_id in (${repo_id})
  union
  select id, merge_commit_sha, pull_request_key as commit_sha from pull_requests where base_repo_id in (${repo_id})
),

_commit_count_of_pr as(
  select
    SUBSTRING_INDEX(rcd.new_ref_id,'tags/', -1) as tag_name,
    pr.id as pull_request_id,
    count(c.sha) as pr_commit_count
  FROM 
    refs_commits_diffs rcd
		left join commits c on rcd.commit_sha = c.sha
		-- left join pull_request_commits prc on c.sha = prc.commit_sha
		left join _combine_pr pr on c.sha = pr.commit_sha
	where
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rcd.new_ref_id,':', 4) in (${repo_id})
		-- and rcd.new_ref_id in (SELECT new_ref_id FROM _last_5_tags)
		and SUBSTRING_INDEX(rcd.new_ref_id,':', -1) in (SELECT new_ref_id FROM _last_5_tags)
	group by 1,2
),

_pr_issues as(
  select
    pri.pull_request_id,
    pri.issue_id,
    i.issue_key,
    i.type,
    row_number() over(partition by issue_id ORDER by pr.created_date asc) as pr_rank
  from
    pull_request_issues pri
    left join pull_requests pr on pri.pull_request_id = pr.id
    left join issues i on pri.issue_id = i.id
  where 
    i.issue_key != 0
),

_final_results as(
  select
    distinct ccop.*, pi.type
  from 
    _commit_count_of_pr ccop
    left join _pr_issues pi on ccop.pull_request_id = pi.pull_request_id
      where pi.pr_rank = 1
  order by 1
)

SELECT
  tag_name,
  case when type != '' then type else 'UNKNOWN' end as type,
  sum(pr_commit_count) as commit_count
from _final_results
group by 1,2

-- Get the work-type distribution in the last 5 tags
with refs_commits_diffs as(
  SELECT
    new_refs.id as new_ref_id, old_refs.id as old_ref_id, commits_diffs.commit_sha, new_commit_sha, old_commit_sha
  FROM
    commits_diffs
  LEFT JOIN refs new_refs on new_refs.commit_sha = commits_diffs.new_commit_sha
  LEFT JOIN refs old_refs on old_refs.commit_sha = commits_diffs.old_commit_sha
),

_last_5_tags as(
  SELECT 
    -- distinct new_ref_id, old_ref_id
    distinct SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_id,':', -1) as new_ref_id, SUBSTRING_INDEX(old_ref_id,':', -1) as old_ref_id
  FROM 
    refs_commits_diffs
  WHERE
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_id,':', 4) in (${repo_id})
	ORDER BY 1 desc
	LIMIT 1,1
),


_combine_pr as (
  select pull_request_id as id, commit_sha, p.pull_request_key as pull_request_key from pull_request_commits left join pull_requests p on pull_request_commits.pull_request_id = p.id
  where base_repo_id in (${repo_id})
  union
  select id, merge_commit_sha, pull_request_key as commit_sha from pull_requests where base_repo_id in (${repo_id})
),

_commit_count_of_pr as(
  select
    SUBSTRING_INDEX(rcd.new_ref_id,'tags/', -1) as tag_name,
    pr.id as pull_request_id,
    count(c.sha) as pr_commit_count
  FROM 
    refs_commits_diffs rcd
		left join commits c on rcd.commit_sha = c.sha
		-- left join pull_request_commits prc on c.sha = prc.commit_sha
		left join _combine_pr pr on c.sha = pr.commit_sha
	where
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rcd.new_ref_id,':', 4) in (${repo_id})
		-- and rcd.new_ref_id in (SELECT new_ref_id FROM _last_5_tags)
		and SUBSTRING_INDEX(rcd.new_ref_id,':', -1) in (SELECT new_ref_id FROM _last_5_tags)
	group by 1,2
),

_pr_issues as(
  select
    pri.pull_request_id,
    pri.issue_id,
    i.issue_key,
    i.type,
    row_number() over(partition by issue_id ORDER by pr.created_date asc) as pr_rank
  from
    pull_request_issues pri
    left join pull_requests pr on pri.pull_request_id = pr.id
    left join issues i on pri.issue_id = i.id
  where 
    i.issue_key != 0
),

_final_results as(
  select
    distinct ccop.*, pi.type
  from 
    _commit_count_of_pr ccop
    left join _pr_issues pi on ccop.pull_request_id = pi.pull_request_id
      where pi.pr_rank = 1
  order by 1
)

SELECT
  tag_name,
  case when type != '' then type else 'UNKNOWN' end as type,
  sum(pr_commit_count) as commit_count
from _final_results
group by 1,2

-- Get the work-type distribution in the last 5 tags
with refs_commits_diffs as(
  SELECT
    new_refs.id as new_ref_id, old_refs.id as old_ref_id, commits_diffs.commit_sha, new_commit_sha, old_commit_sha
  FROM
    commits_diffs
  LEFT JOIN refs new_refs on new_refs.commit_sha = commits_diffs.new_commit_sha
  LEFT JOIN refs old_refs on old_refs.commit_sha = commits_diffs.old_commit_sha
),

_last_5_tags as(
  SELECT 
    -- distinct new_ref_id, old_ref_id
    distinct SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_id,':', -1) as new_ref_id, SUBSTRING_INDEX(old_ref_id,':', -1) as old_ref_id
  FROM 
    refs_commits_diffs
  WHERE
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_id,':', 4) in (${repo_id})
	ORDER BY 1 desc
	LIMIT 2,1
),


_combine_pr as (
  select pull_request_id as id, commit_sha, p.pull_request_key as pull_request_key from pull_request_commits left join pull_requests p on pull_request_commits.pull_request_id = p.id
  where base_repo_id in (${repo_id})
  union
  select id, merge_commit_sha, pull_request_key as commit_sha from pull_requests where base_repo_id in (${repo_id})
),

_commit_count_of_pr as(
  select
    SUBSTRING_INDEX(rcd.new_ref_id,'tags/', -1) as tag_name,
    pr.id as pull_request_id,
    count(c.sha) as pr_commit_count
  FROM 
    refs_commits_diffs rcd
		left join commits c on rcd.commit_sha = c.sha
		-- left join pull_request_commits prc on c.sha = prc.commit_sha
		left join _combine_pr pr on c.sha = pr.commit_sha
	where
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rcd.new_ref_id,':', 4) in (${repo_id})
		-- and rcd.new_ref_id in (SELECT new_ref_id FROM _last_5_tags)
		and SUBSTRING_INDEX(rcd.new_ref_id,':', -1) in (SELECT new_ref_id FROM _last_5_tags)
	group by 1,2
),

_pr_issues as(
  select
    pri.pull_request_id,
    pri.issue_id,
    i.issue_key,
    i.type,
    row_number() over(partition by issue_id ORDER by pr.created_date asc) as pr_rank
  from
    pull_request_issues pri
    left join pull_requests pr on pri.pull_request_id = pr.id
    left join issues i on pri.issue_id = i.id
  where 
    i.issue_key != 0
),

_final_results as(
  select
    distinct ccop.*, pi.type
  from 
    _commit_count_of_pr ccop
    left join _pr_issues pi on ccop.pull_request_id = pi.pull_request_id
      where pi.pr_rank = 1
  order by 1
)

SELECT
  tag_name,
  case when type != '' then type else 'UNKNOWN' end as type,
  sum(pr_commit_count) as commit_count
from _final_results
group by 1,2

-- Get each contributor's work in bugfixing in the last 5 tags
with refs_commits_diffs as(
  SELECT
    new_refs.id as new_ref_id, old_refs.id as old_ref_id, commits_diffs.commit_sha, new_commit_sha, old_commit_sha
  FROM
    commits_diffs
  LEFT JOIN refs new_refs on new_refs.commit_sha = commits_diffs.new_commit_sha
  LEFT JOIN refs old_refs on old_refs.commit_sha = commits_diffs.old_commit_sha
),

_last_5_tags as(
  SELECT 
    -- distinct new_ref_id, old_ref_id
    distinct SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_id,':', -1) as new_ref_id, SUBSTRING_INDEX(old_ref_id,':', -1) as old_ref_id
  FROM 
    refs_commits_diffs
  WHERE
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_id,':', 4) in (${repo_id})
	ORDER BY 1 desc
	LIMIT 5
),

_author_commits as(
  SELECT 
  	c.author_name,
    count(c.sha) as commit_count
  FROM 
    refs_commits_diffs rcf
    left join commits c on rcf.commit_sha = c.sha
  WHERE
  	-- rcf.new_ref_id in (SELECT new_ref_id FROM _last_5_tags)
  	SUBSTRING_INDEX(rcf.new_ref_id,':', 4) in (${repo_id})
  	and SUBSTRING_INDEX(rcf.new_ref_id,':', -1) in (SELECT new_ref_id FROM _last_5_tags)
  GROUP BY 1
),

_author_commits_running_total as(
  SELECT 
    *, 
    sum(commit_count) OVER (Order by commit_count desc) AS running_total
  FROM 
    _author_commits
),

_percentile as(
  SELECT 
    author_name,
    commit_count,
    running_total/sum(commit_count) OVER () AS cumulative_percentage
  FROM 
    _author_commits_running_total
)


SELECT 
  count(case when cumulative_percentage <= 0.8 then author_name else null end)/count(*) as "contributors who contributed 80% of dev_eq"
FROM _percentile

with refs_commits_diffs as(
  SELECT
    new_refs.id as new_ref_id, old_refs.id as old_ref_id, commits_diffs.commit_sha, new_commit_sha, old_commit_sha
  FROM
    commits_diffs
  LEFT JOIN refs new_refs on new_refs.commit_sha = commits_diffs.new_commit_sha
  LEFT JOIN refs old_refs on old_refs.commit_sha = commits_diffs.old_commit_sha
),

_last_5_tags as(
  SELECT 
    -- distinct new_ref_id, old_ref_id
    distinct SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_id,':', -1) as new_ref_id, SUBSTRING_INDEX(old_ref_id,':', -1) as old_ref_id
  FROM 
    refs_commits_diffs
  WHERE
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_id,':', 4) in (${repo_id})
	ORDER BY 1 desc
	LIMIT 5
)


SELECT 
	c.author_name,
  count(c.sha) total_dev_eq
FROM 
  refs_commits_diffs rcf
  left join commits c on rcf.commit_sha = c.sha
WHERE
	-- rcf.new_ref_id in (SELECT new_ref_id FROM _last_5_tags)
	SUBSTRING_INDEX(rcf.new_ref_id,':', 4) in (${repo_id})
	and SUBSTRING_INDEX(rcf.new_ref_id,':', -1) in (SELECT new_ref_id FROM _last_5_tags)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 2 desc
limit 10

options.content: This dashboard is created based on this [data schema](https://devlake.apache.org/docs/DataModels/DevLakeDomainLayerSchema). Want to add more metrics? Please follow the [guide](https://devlake.apache.org/docs/Configuration/Dashboards/GrafanaUserGuide).

list.definition: select concat(name, '--', id) as text from repos
list.label: Repo
list.name: repo_id
list.query: select concat(name, '--', id) as text from repos
